info.name: HyperFlex iSCSI management APIs
info.description:
REST APIs for iSCSI management on HyperFlex cluster.


Start with filling in the HX IP address in the Variables HXCIP

Goto
STEP1. 
Fill in the username and password to get an Access Token.
Hit SEND and the token will be copied into the Collection variable.
Go to 
STEP2 to get the Cluster UUID.
This Cluster UUID will be copied into the Collection variable.

Requests with a X in front are not tested and it's possible you will have to change it.

item.name: Get informatin about an iSCSI LUN on a Target

header.description: Languages the client is able to understand, and preferred locale variant

Access token obtained from AAA which identifies user, user's role and permission to access resource. Format [token type] [access token]. [token type] is either Bearer or Basic. [access token] is the access token obtained from AAA at the time of authentication.

item.name: Get  iSCSI LUNs on a Target

header.description: Languages the client is able to understand, and preferred locale variant

Access token obtained from AAA which identifies user, user's role and permission to access resource. Format [token type] [access token]. [token type] is either Bearer or Basic. [access token] is the access token obtained from AAA at the time of authentication.

query.description: Name of LUN. Filter search to LUN with this name
Get LUNs starting from this index.
Maximum number of LUNs to retrieve.
The LUNs retrieved will be sorted based on LUN Name. This parameter tells if sorting should be done based on ascending or descending order. Default is ascending order.

response.name: Internal Server Error. Server encountered an error while processing request.

query.description: UUID of Target. Filter search to Initiator Groups bound to this Target.
UUID of LUN. Filter search to Initiator Groups bound to Target which contains this LUN.
Name of Initiator Group. Filter search to Initiator Groups with this name
Get Initiator Groups starting from this index.
Maximum number of Initiator Groups to retrieve.
The Initiator Groups retrieved will be sorted based on Initiator Group name. This parameter tells if sorting should be done based on ascending or descending order. Default is ascending order.

request.description:
In the Collection variable, put the IP address of the HyperFlex Cluster.

Fill in the username and password in the body.
The HX Token will be saved as a varialbe in the Collection.
The Cluster UUID will be saved as a varialbe in the Collection.

query.description: Detailed output of the Task

request.description: It will get the last HxTaskID saved in the collection variable.
